description: This week we've decided to add TWO of our shorter shoots, so please remember to look at both! Samantha is the second. She's a hot babe from LA. She was the first to try the soundfucker - a machine powered by a sub-woofer. The soundfucker seemed to just tickle her. She got into later machines including the revamped intruder mk II, the rocking chair and the hammer.
title: Samantha Ryan
